fields.name: appFields
fields.description: 指定查询storyboard下的app字段，不指定则默认返回 appId,name,position,homepage,menuIcon,icons

contracts.name: ScenarioCategoryFactoryRestore
contracts.description: 场景中心分类恢复出厂设置

description.zh: 场景中心分类恢复出厂设置

contracts.name: SolutionCategoryFactoryRestore
contracts.description: 解决方案分类恢复出厂设置

description.zh: 解决方案分类恢复出厂设置

fields.name: state
fields.description: query condition: app state(多字段用;分开)

fields.name: userRange
fields.description: 用户开通范围(user.name或user_group.instanceId，后者以:开头)

description.zh: 获取"默认开通app"开关配置

fields.name: activateStatus
fields.description: 过滤开通状态(activated/inactive), 空为不过滤

fields.name: category
fields.description: 按所属Launchpad分类查询, 空为不限制分类

fields.name: uncategorized
fields.description: 仅查询未分类应用（优先级比category参数高）

fields.name: q
fields.description: 模糊搜索（应用名称、ID、描述）

fields.name: readAuthorizers
fields.description: 开通白名单。[]空数组表示向全部用户开通, ["defaultUser"]表示未有人开通(仅管理员)

fields.name: launchpadInfo
fields.description: 所属导航菜单及分类菜单

contracts.name: SearchMicroAppCategory
contracts.description: 查询微应用分类及微应用

description.zh: 更新"默认开通app"开关配置

fields.name: toSingleNode
fields.description: 获取单节点/集群的依赖

contracts.name: ReportAfterFactoryUpdate
contracts.description: 更新出厂设置后上报数据

description.zh: 出厂设置更新后上报数据

fields.name: meta
fields.description: 元数据定义（当前用于获取菜单信息）

fields.name: isFromUnionApp
fields.description: 是否是联合app升级方式：当前有两种：联合app升级/单个sa-na升级

}\\n\\n if (filters.type) {\\n if (issue._type !== \\\"story\\\" && issue._type !== filters.type) {\\n return false;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n if (filters.story) {\\n if (issue._type !== \\\"story\\\" && issue.parent[0]?.name !== filters.story) {\\n return false;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n if(filters.step) {\\n if(issue.step != filters.step){\\n return false\\n }\\n }\\n\\n return true;\\n });\\n}\\n\\ninterface contracts.name: SyncDependency
contracts.description: 同步依赖(包括框架、构件、图片)

fields.name: file
fields.description: 依赖的压缩打包文件, 格式为tar.gz

request.body:
--abcdefg1234567 Content-Disposition: form-data; name="depName"
brick_next --abcdefg1234567 Content-Disposition: form-data; name="depVersion"
1.0.0 --abcdefg1234567 Content-Disposition: form-data; name="depType"
core --abcdefg1234567 Content-Disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="brick_next.tar.gz" Content-Type: application/x-gzip
<File Content> --abcdefg1234567

fields.name: parent_instanceId
fields.description: 父菜单或者父菜单项的instanceId

contracts.name: DeleteMenuItem
contracts.description: 删除或隐藏菜单项（分组）

fields.name: instanceId
fields.description: 要隐藏或者删除的菜单项的instanceId

fields.name: delete
fields.description: 是否真的删除菜单，为false时仅隐藏菜单项而不删除

fields.name: appIds
fields.description: 小产品id，多个用逗号分割

fields.name: target
fields.description: 要移动到目标下面的instanceId，支持menu和menuItem

fields.name: needDeployedResourceInfos
fields.description: 需要部署的资源包信息

fields.name: fields
fields.description: 修改的菜单的属性列表

fields.name: fields
fields.description: 修改的菜单项的属性列表
